item.title: As a tool builder, my view is that L2s should stretch as much as possible for EVM equivalence. It's doable, and requires extra effort. I do not think introducing plugin systems or non-"Type-1" EVM compatible code in Foundry makes sense. Cannot come at the expense of the tools.
